import React from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import AddAsset from './addasset'; const AssetTable = ({ assets, onAddAsset, onDeleteAsset, categories, locations }) => { return (
{assets.map((asset) => ( ))}
ID Date Created Asset Name Details Category Subcategory Location Quantity Cost Actions
{asset.assetID} {asset.createdDate} {asset.assetName} {asset.assetDetails} {asset.selectedCategory} {asset.selectedSubCategory} {asset.selectedLocation} {asset.quantity} {`₱${asset.cost}`}
); }; export default AssetTable;
